help.title: Blackburn Buccaneer S2
help.line: Approach speed (full flaps/aileron droop/tail flaps/airbrake): 145 kts IAS
There are only 120 lbs of fuel available in the recuperators for inverted flight
at a time. If you exhaust this fuel, the engines will revert to ground idle.
Return to normal flight replenishes the recuperators.
Fuel may be jettisoned by the operation of Fuel Jettison knob. Fuel will be
jettisoned until either 4000 lbs remains, or the knob is shut.
To use the Autotrim function - put the aircraft in the attitude required with the
joystick, press key t, centre the joystick, release key t. Key T removes ALL trim
